uh the good side of this all is that
there is a far greater interest in

part of the general cultural dialogue

to accentuate that so of course you know

of our time in in in so many cities now
uh the art museum is the physical symbol
of the statement this community is

most care has been lavished the most

and so you know all that is is mostly to
the good but in life you know in

price for that but it's still mostly a
positive
thing I think inevitably you would have
to say Frank Gary has had the most
profound effect because he's the
architect who
Bridges the sort of serious world of

architecture academically or practice it
or think of it you know uh in a critical
way within that world and popular
culture um and there are very few
examples in history of an architect
being that bridge and creating buildings

and viewing them as something important
